## Content checklist

- [ ] Create file at `apps/janodetzel.com/content/projects/<slug>.md`
- [ ] Add frontmatter (title, description, date, tags, status if used)
- [ ] Add project overview and goals
- [ ] Add implementation details and decisions
- [ ] Add screenshots/media links (if available)
- [ ] Add repo and live/demo links
- [ ] Proofread for clarity and grammar

## Done criteria

- [ ] Content reviewed
- [ ] Links verified and working
- [ ] All checklist items complete
- [ ] Ready to publish
